about_the_game:
Mushrooms and Spores take center stage in a Multiplayer-focused fitness battle!

SporeBloom utilizes thoughtful asynchronous mechanics for surprise and discovery on every turn; you cohabitate the living environment on your quest to thrive.

Play With Friends or Solo (CPU)

Show off your favorite spores with funky cosmetics earned via player progression unlocks.

High Re-playability

Maps utilize procedural generation to foster innovative puzzle-like challenges, including varied shapes, resources, special tiles, and dynamic events. Develop extensive underground networks or concentrate on cultivating a diverse array of specialized mushrooms.

Mycology Science

SporeBloom is created by a solo mushroom enthusiast (Jake Collinge), inspired by real mushroom behavior and surrounding ecology:

  • Eat detritus ‘waste’ material

  • Parasitize opponent mushrooms

  • Grow above and below ground

  • Form mutual relationships to earn Nitrogen

  • Seek out humus and other resources

  • React to the environment: wind direction, humidity and soil quality

  • Defend your underground territory

  • Cut off opponent resources

  • …and much more

Complete ‘Behavior’ Side Objectives

Observe your organism doing something novel and earn rewards such as bonus ‘Blooms’, energy, network captures and more. Every match presents a fresh slate of combinations.

Player Progression via Spore Studies

Each playable Spore has secrets to unlock. Spend your Mutation points in the skill tree to access new Blooms and playstyles, Bloom Traits, Lab Definitions and Cosmetics for your Blooms and Mushroom Avatar.

Expansive Spore Roster (playable species)

SporeBloom will continue to expand post release, introducing new families of Blooms, traits, abilities and cosmetics, flexing the immense variety of techniques real mushrooms use to survive

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10 +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 650 MB available space

short_description: Mushroom science meets Turn-Based Strategy in a multiplayer battle for fitness. Spread underground networks and grow fantastical mushrooms. Parasitize your opponents or peacefully scour the map for food and amass impressive networks.
